mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectExeWork * Description : DB2PG * Author : 변승우 **/ SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS ROWNUM , (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS IDX , WRK_NM , SRC_DBMS_DSCD , SRC_IP , SRC_DATABASE , TAR_IP , TAR_DATABASE ,'SOURCE (DBTYPE:'|| SRC_DBMS_DSCD || ' IP:' ||SRC_IP||' DB:'||SRC_DATABASE||') → TARGET (IP:'||TAR_IP||' DB:'||TAR_DATABASE||')' as MIG_INFO FROM T_DB2PG_EXEWORK

/** * Query ID : selectDb2pgMonitoring * Description : DB2PG * Author : 변승우 **/ SELECT TABLE_NM , TOTAL_CNT , MIG_CNT , START_TIME , END_TIME , to_char((ELAPSED_TIME||' second')::interval, 'HH24:MI:SS') as ELAPSED_TIME , STATUS FROM T_DB2PG_MONITORING WHERE WRK_NM = #{wrk_nm} ORDER BY (CASE STATUS WHEN 'RUNNING' THEN 1 WHEN 'SUCCESS' THEN 2 WHEN 'FAIL' THEN 3 end) , STATUS , TABLE_NM
